description:
During the battle with the Red Dragon, Warrior Tanta refuses to listen to Fire and continues to attack without command!  Although Fire is clearly vulnerable, he used his own body as a shield to protect Tanta and the others.  Even Tanta is moved by this act of camaraderie...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Warrior Tanta and the Red Dragon
戦士タンタとレッドドラゴン
